Articles.Content:
So I was thinking, I can do Blender, but Blender has so many more tools and they kind of confuse me:

I found Wings 3D on my computer, and I figured out how to make a .dae w/Texture file.

Now I only have 2 questions:

How do I get the grid to measure a meter?

How do I change the letter default texture to something so distinct I can tell where what faces border so I can texture the faces individually?

Help?
